title: Cant start geth
body:
#### System information

Geth version: `1.7.2-beta-01bf0f30`
Version: Ubuntu Server 16.04

#### Expected behaviour
Initialize geth attach

#### Actual behaviour
```You've encountered a sought after, hard to reproduce bug. Please report this to the developers <3 https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/issues
index allocation went beyond available resultCache space
/home/marcos/dev/workspace/1.8/src/github.com/alastria/quorum/build/_workspace/src/github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth/downloader/queue.go:491
goroutine 382 [running]:
runtime/debug.Stack(0x8f, 0x0, 0x0)

#### BUG! PLEASE REPORT ####
You seem to be using `quorum`. Please open an issue in their repo, this is `go-ethereum`. Also, we've released 21 versions since 1.7.2, so this code is ancient (2017).
